Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui

Class EndSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.PSP30.View.Gui.EndSceneController
  • public class EndSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows the end scene, one for the winner player and one for the other.

        public static void winner​(java.lang.String winner)

        Parameters:

        Throws:
